entries.title: Tesla’s Cybertruck Is Coming Soon. Maybe.
entries.description: Already two years behind schedule, the Cybertruck has experts wondering how the company will manufacture its unusual stainless steel “exoskeleton.”

entries.title: Musk Pledged to Cleanse Twitter of Child Abuse Content. Is It Working?
entries.description: Child sexual abuse imagery spreads on Twitter even after the company is notified: One video drew 120,000 views. “Sewer rats,” as one regulator described bad actors, remain.

entries.title: Do You Work in the Auto Industry? We Want to Hear From You.
entries.description: Sales of electric vehicles are growing fast, and automakers are investing billions of dollars in new technology and factories. We want to know how jobs are changing.

entries.title: At This School, Computer Science Class Now Includes Critiquing Chatbots
entries.description: Move over, coding. Some schools are asking student programmers to think critically about rapid advances in artificial intelligence.
